name: main_endpoint
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool amazon_pricing_and_product_info.
Tool description: Fullest product info
All Marketplaces
Customer support for API users
Buy box info
Prime & FBA detection
Fast, scalable & reliable API
API description: Fetches product information from the Amazon Pricing and Product Info API using the given ASIN and domain.

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number of the product.

domain.description: The domain from which to fetch the product information (e.g., 'com', 'co.uk').
